person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A newspaper reported allegations in April that diplomats had directed Australian government aid to certain foreign orphanages to secure sex with children .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| diplomats |
| Australian government |

Note: The paragraph does not mention any specific names of individuals, so no names can be included in the table.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| diplomats |

Note: In this context, "diplomats" is the only entity that clearly refers to a person or group of people. The "Australian government" is not a person, it is an organization.
